Name: bleaching, textile | bleaching, textile | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/13:Manufacture of textiles/131:Spinning, weaving and finishing of textiles/1313:Finishing of textiles
Description: The process involves immersing fabric in bleach bath and the bath circulates around the fabric. Bath is heated by electricity generated Â steam. This is followed by water extraction, drying and compacting. The fabric is then folded and sent for further processing such asmercerising, dyeing/printing etc. (no packaging).
